title: The concerned authority putting restrictions as per their respective legislations / regulations / rules as mentioned above shall make available to the Authority full details of restrictions (including graded restrictions, if any) along with the relevant map detailing restrictions
clause_text: The concerned authority putting restrictions as per their respective legislations / regulations / rules as mentioned above shall make available to the Authority full details of restrictions (including graded restrictions, if any) along with the relevant map detailing restrictions. section: Authorities to Supply Complete Information about Restrictions to the Authority
